original_text:
Icy Wilds
I giocatori più appassionati avranno senza dubbio notato che da qualche tempo il mondo delle slot machine non fa tanto per rinnovarsi soprattutto per quel che riguarda il tema: abbiamo a disposizione centinaia di giochi ambientati all’ombra delle piramidi, con l’Egitto servito in tutte le salse; allo stesso modo non si contano le slot a tema cinese o quelle che sfruttano le antiche civiltà del passato, passando per le intramontabili Fruit Machine.
In tutto ciò Icy Wilds, nuova slot nel catalogo della IGT appare come una ventata d’aria fresca, in tutti i sensi!
L’ispirazione per questo gioco è chiaramente tratta dal cartoon Frozen della Disney: i personaggi sono infatti una principessa del ghiaccio e diversi animali che le fanno compagnia, con un enorme orso bianco che ricorda molto da vicinol’orso Iorek, protagonista di His Dark Materials di Pullman.
Per quanto riguarda il compartimento grafico, un ruolo da protagonista spetta all’aurora boreale che fa da sfondo al gioco e che getta la luce su una sorta di bosco immerso nella neve.
I colori prevalenti sono le tonalità pastello del celeste e del rosa, e tutto appare brillare nel ghiaccio scintillante.
Ad arricchire l’esperienza di gioco si aggiunge una colonna sonora perfettamente a tema che sembra suonata da strumenti di ghiaccio.
Gameplay di Icy Wilds
Giocare a questa slot machine di casa IGT è molto semplice: il gameplay molto lineare la rende un gioco perfetto anche per coloro che si affacciano per la prima volta al mondo delle slot.
Il range di scommessa tuttavia non è adatto ai deboli di cuore: se la puntata minima ha un normalissimo valore di 50 centesimi, la puntata massima è veramente da capogiro, arrivando alla cifra di 1.000 €!
Una puntata così alta fa pensare anche a una volatilità alta, e così è: Icy Wilds non promette vincite piccole e frequenti, ma potrà stupirvi con premi davvero interessanti.
Per quanto riguarda il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP), la slot di ghiaccio di casa IGT non delude: con un buon 96,15%, nella media della maggior parte dei giochi di slot reperibili online, può essere considerata del tutto soddisfacente da questo punto di vista.
Simboli regolari e speciali di Icy Wilds
Per vincere su Icy Wild è necessario ottenere un allineamento di almeno tre simboli identici su rulli adiacenti a partire da sinistra verso destra.
I simboli non tematici sono rappresentati dai numeri e le lettere che si riferiscono alle carte da gioco, dal J al K.
Tra i simboli tematici, quelli meno redditizi sono le tre creature della neve, l’ermellino, la civetta e la lince, che pagano fino a 100 volte il valore della puntata; a seguire abbiamo i gioielli e infine la principessa che regala delle vincite fino a 500 volte la puntata.
È presente un simbolo Wild, rappresentato semplicemente dalla scritta corrispondente, mentre l’Orso Polare è invece lo Scatter del gioco, che può regalare fino a 45 giri gratuiti!

raw_translation.response:
"Icy Wilds" Review

Experienced gamers will surely notice that the world of slot machines has not made much effort to renew itself lately, especially when it comes to themes. We have hundreds of games set in the shadow of pyramids, Egypt served in all its variations, as well as Chinese-themed slots and those that exploit ancient civilizations of the past, not to mention the timeless fruit machines.

In all this, "Icy Wilds", a new slot in the IGT catalog, appears as a breath of fresh air, in every sense!

The inspiration for this game is clearly taken from Disney's "Frozen" cartoon: the characters are in fact an ice princess and several animals that keep her company, with a huge white bear that closely resembles Iorek, the protagonist of Pullman's "His Dark Materials".

The graphics are outstanding, with the polar aurora borealis playing a leading role in the background of the game and lighting up a sort of snowy forest. The predominant colors are pastel shades of blue and pink, and everything shines in the sparkling ice. To enrich the gaming experience, there is a perfectly themed soundtrack that sounds like it is played on ice instruments.

Gameplay of Icy Wilds

Playing this IGT slot machine is very simple: the smooth gameplay makes it a perfect game even for those who are new to the world of slots. However, the betting range is not for the faint of heart: while the minimum bet has a normal value of 50 cents, the maximum bet is truly mind-boggling, reaching up to €1,000! Such a high bet suggests high volatility, and that's exactly the case with Icy Wilds. It does not promise small and frequent wins, but it may surprise you with really interesting prizes.

As for the theoretical return to player (RTP), the Icy Wilds slot from IGT does not disappoint, boasting a decent 96.15%, which is in line with the majority of online slot games and fully satisfactory from this perspective.

Regular and special symbols of Icy Wilds

To win on Icy Wilds, you must get a lineup of at least three identical symbols on adjacent reels starting from left to right. The non-themed symbols are represented by numbers and letters referring to playing cards, from J to K. Among the thematic symbols, the least profitable are the three snow creatures - ermine, owl, and lynx - which pay up to 100 times the value of the bet. Following these are the jewels and finally the princess, who offers wins up to 500 times the bet. There is a Wild symbol, simply represented by the corresponding word, while the Polar Bear is the Scatter of the game that can give up to 45 free spins!

message.content:
"Icy Wilds" Review

Experienced gamers will surely notice that the world of slot machines has not made much effort to renew itself lately, especially when it comes to themes. We have hundreds of games set in the shadow of pyramids, Egypt served in all its variations, as well as Chinese-themed slots and those that exploit ancient civilizations of the past, not to mention the timeless fruit machines.

In all this, "Icy Wilds", a new slot in the IGT catalog, appears as a breath of fresh air, in every sense!

The inspiration for this game is clearly taken from Disney's "Frozen" cartoon: the characters are in fact an ice princess and several animals that keep her company, with a huge white bear that closely resembles Iorek, the protagonist of Pullman's "His Dark Materials".

The graphics are outstanding, with the polar aurora borealis playing a leading role in the background of the game and lighting up a sort of snowy forest. The predominant colors are pastel shades of blue and pink, and everything shines in the sparkling ice. To enrich the gaming experience, there is a perfectly themed soundtrack that sounds like it is played on ice instruments.

Gameplay of Icy Wilds

Playing this IGT slot machine is very simple: the smooth gameplay makes it a perfect game even for those who are new to the world of slots. However, the betting range is not for the faint of heart: while the minimum bet has a normal value of 50 cents, the maximum bet is truly mind-boggling, reaching up to €1,000! Such a high bet suggests high volatility, and that's exactly the case with Icy Wilds. It does not promise small and frequent wins, but it may surprise you with really interesting prizes.

As for the theoretical return to player (RTP), the Icy Wilds slot from IGT does not disappoint, boasting a decent 96.15%, which is in line with the majority of online slot games and fully satisfactory from this perspective.

Regular and special symbols of Icy Wilds

To win on Icy Wilds, you must get a lineup of at least three identical symbols on adjacent reels starting from left to right. The non-themed symbols are represented by numbers and letters referring to playing cards, from J to K. Among the thematic symbols, the least profitable are the three snow creatures - ermine, owl, and lynx - which pay up to 100 times the value of the bet. Following these are the jewels and finally the princess, who offers wins up to 500 times the bet. There is a Wild symbol, simply represented by the corresponding word, while the Polar Bear is the Scatter of the game that can give up to 45 free spins!

raw_translation.response:
Icy Wilds
For the seasoned players, it's hard not to notice the absence of novelty when it comes to themes in slot machines. The industry is flooded with hundreds of games that are set in the shadows of pyramids, with Egypt being served in every possible way. Similarly, we have an abundant supply of Chinese-themed slots and those that use ancient civilizations of the past, along with the classic fruit machines. However, amidst all that, Icy Wilds by IGT is a breath of fresh air in every sense!

The inspiration for this game is clearly drawn from Disney's Frozen cartoon. The characters include an ice princess and various animals that keep her company, along with a huge, white polar bear that closely resembles Iorek from Pullman's His Dark Materials. The game is set against the backdrop of the northern lights, backlighting a snow-covered forest in pastel shades of pink and blue, and everything sparkles in the shimmering ice.

The gameplay of Icy Wilds is straightforward, making it a perfect game even for those who are new to the world of slots. However, the betting range is not for the faint of heart. While the minimum bet value is normal at 50 cents, the maximum bet amount is staggering, going up to €1,000! Such a high bet makes one think that Icy Wilds is rather high in volatility, which it is. It promises no small and frequent wins, but it can certainly surprise you with some truly interesting prizes.

As far as the theoretical return to player (RTP) is concerned, IGT's icy slot does not disappoint, with a good 96.15%, which is on par with most online slot games, making it entirely satisfying from that perspective.

In order to win on Icy Wilds, you need to line up at least three identical symbols on adjacent reels, starting from the left and moving towards the right. The non-themed symbols represent numbers and letters that refer to playing cards, from J to K. Among the thematic symbols, the ones that are less profitable are the three snow creatures, the ermine, the owl, and the lynx, which pay up to 100 times the value of the bet. Then come the jewels and finally the princess, who awards winnings of up to 500 times the bet. The game has a Wild symbol, simply represented by the corresponding wording. Meanwhile, the Polar Bear serves as the game's Scatter, which can award up to 45 free spins!

message.content:
Icy Wilds
For the seasoned players, it's hard not to notice the absence of novelty when it comes to themes in slot machines. The industry is flooded with hundreds of games that are set in the shadows of pyramids, with Egypt being served in every possible way. Similarly, we have an abundant supply of Chinese-themed slots and those that use ancient civilizations of the past, along with the classic fruit machines. However, amidst all that, Icy Wilds by IGT is a breath of fresh air in every sense!

The inspiration for this game is clearly drawn from Disney's Frozen cartoon. The characters include an ice princess and various animals that keep her company, along with a huge, white polar bear that closely resembles Iorek from Pullman's His Dark Materials. The game is set against the backdrop of the northern lights, backlighting a snow-covered forest in pastel shades of pink and blue, and everything sparkles in the shimmering ice.

The gameplay of Icy Wilds is straightforward, making it a perfect game even for those who are new to the world of slots. However, the betting range is not for the faint of heart. While the minimum bet value is normal at 50 cents, the maximum bet amount is staggering, going up to €1,000! Such a high bet makes one think that Icy Wilds is rather high in volatility, which it is. It promises no small and frequent wins, but it can certainly surprise you with some truly interesting prizes.

As far as the theoretical return to player (RTP) is concerned, IGT's icy slot does not disappoint, with a good 96.15%, which is on par with most online slot games, making it entirely satisfying from that perspective.

In order to win on Icy Wilds, you need to line up at least three identical symbols on adjacent reels, starting from the left and moving towards the right. The non-themed symbols represent numbers and letters that refer to playing cards, from J to K. Among the thematic symbols, the ones that are less profitable are the three snow creatures, the ermine, the owl, and the lynx, which pay up to 100 times the value of the bet. Then come the jewels and finally the princess, who awards winnings of up to 500 times the bet. The game has a Wild symbol, simply represented by the corresponding wording. Meanwhile, the Polar Bear serves as the game's Scatter, which can award up to 45 free spins!

response.headline: Gameplay
response.content: The gameplay of Icy Wilds is smooth and easy to follow, making it a great option for both experienced slot players and newcomers. The betting range is large, with a minimum bet of 50 cents and a maximum bet of €1,000, indicating high volatility. The theoretical RTP of 96.15% is in line with industry standards and satisfying.

response.headline: Graphics
response.content: Icy Wilds boasts outstanding graphics that will captivate players from the moment the game loads. The game's theme is inspired by Disney's Frozen, and the graphics feature a snowy forest illuminated by the polar aurora borealis, with pastel shades of pink and blue colors running throughout the game's design. The sound effects perfectly complement the graphics offering an immersive gaming experience.

response.headline: Winning Symbols
response.content: Icy Wilds offers a plethora of non-themed symbols such as playing cards from J to K. The three primary but relatively low paying symbols are snow creatures - ermine, owl, and lynx, paying up to 100 times the bet. The jewels serve as the higher paying symbols and are followed by the ice princess, which offers up to 500 times the bet as the symbol with the highest payout. The Wild symbol is the corresponding word, replacing all other symbols except the Scatter. The Scatter is represented as the Polar Bear and can give up to 45 free spins.

response.headline: Betting Range
response.content: Icy Wilds has a betting range that is not for the faint of heart. The minimum bet is 50 cents, and the maximum bet is €1,000, indicating high volatility. The game promises the potential for significant wins but does not offer small, frequent payouts.

response.headline: Scatter Symbol
response.content: The Polar Bear is Icy Wilds' Scatter symbol, and it can give up to 45 free spins. Players need to land at least three Scatter symbols on the game's reels to get free spins. The Scatter increases the chances of winning, and the free spins help to make up for the high volatility of the game.

Review: "Icy Wilds" Review

Experienced gamers will surely notice that the world of slot machines has not made much effort to renew itself lately, especially when it comes to themes. We have hundreds of games set in the shadow of pyramids, Egypt served in all its variations, as well as Chinese-themed slots and those that exploit ancient civilizations of the past, not to mention the timeless fruit machines.

In all this, "Icy Wilds", a new slot in the IGT catalog, appears as a breath of fresh air, in every sense!

The inspiration for this game is clearly taken from Disney's "Frozen" cartoon: the characters are in fact an ice princess and several animals that keep her company, with a huge white bear that closely resembles Iorek, the protagonist of Pullman's "His Dark Materials".

The graphics are outstanding, with the polar aurora borealis playing a leading role in the background of the game and lighting up a sort of snowy forest. The predominant colors are pastel shades of blue and pink, and everything shines in the sparkling ice. To enrich the gaming experience, there is a perfectly themed soundtrack that sounds like it is played on ice instruments.

Gameplay of Icy Wilds

Playing this IGT slot machine is very simple: the smooth gameplay makes it a perfect game even for those who are new to the world of slots. However, the betting range is not for the faint of heart: while the minimum bet has a normal value of 50 cents, the maximum bet is truly mind-boggling, reaching up to €1,000! Such a high bet suggests high volatility, and that's exactly the case with Icy Wilds. It does not promise small and frequent wins, but it may surprise you with really interesting prizes.

As for the theoretical return to player (RTP), the Icy Wilds slot from IGT does not disappoint, boasting a decent 96.15%, which is in line with the majority of online slot games and fully satisfactory from this perspective.

Regular and special symbols of Icy Wilds

To win on Icy Wilds, you must get a lineup of at least three identical symbols on adjacent reels starting from left to right. The non-themed symbols are represented by numbers and letters referring to playing cards, from J to K. Among the thematic symbols, the least profitable are the three snow creatures - ermine, owl, and lynx - which pay up to 100 times the value of the bet. Following these are the jewels and finally the princess, who offers wins up to 500 times the bet. There is a Wild symbol, simply represented by the corresponding word, while the Polar Bear is the Scatter of the game that can give up to 45 free spins!

Gameplay

The gameplay of Icy Wilds is smooth and easy to follow, making it a great option for both experienced slot players and newcomers. Graphics

The game's theme is inspired by Disney's Frozen, and the graphics feature a snowy forest illuminated by the polar aurora borealis, with pastel shades of pink and blue colors running throughout the game's design. The three primary but relatively low paying symbols are snow creatures - ermine, owl, and lynx, paying up to 100 times the bet. The jewels serve as the higher paying symbols and are followed by the ice princess, which offers up to 500 times the bet as the symbol with the highest payout. The Wild symbol is the corresponding word, replacing all other symbols except the Scatter. The Scatter is represented as the Polar Bear and can give up to 45 free spins.

Betting Range

Icy Wilds has a betting range that is not for the faint of heart. The minimum bet is 50 cents, and the maximum bet is €1,000, indicating high volatility. The game promises the potential for significant wins but does not offer small, frequent payouts.

Scatter Symbol

The Polar Bear is Icy Wilds' Scatter symbol, and it can give up to 45 free spins. Players need to land at least three Scatter symbols on the game's reels to get free spins. The Scatter increases the chances of winning, and the free spins help to make up for the high volatility of the game.

faq.question: What is needed to win on Icy Wilds?
faq.answer: To win on Icy Wilds, you must get at least three identical symbols on adjacent reels, starting from the left.

faq.question: What is the payout for the highest-paying symbol?
faq.answer: The princess, which is the highest-paying symbol in Icy Wilds, offers wins up to 500 times the bet.

faq.question: What is the maximum number of free spins in Icy Wilds?
faq.answer: The Scatter symbol in Icy Wilds can give up to 45 free spins.

faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Icy Wilds".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: "Icy Wilds" Review

Experienced gamers will surely notice that the world of slot machines has not made much effort to renew itself lately, especially when it comes to themes. We have hundreds of games set in the shadow of pyramids, Egypt served in all its variations, as well as Chinese-themed slots and those that exploit ancient civilizations of the past, not to mention the timeless fruit machines.

In all this, "Icy Wilds", a new slot in the IGT catalog, appears as a breath of fresh air, in every sense!

The inspiration for this game is clearly taken from Disney's "Frozen" cartoon: the characters are in fact an ice princess and several animals that keep her company, with a huge white bear that closely resembles Iorek, the protagonist of Pullman's "His Dark Materials".

The graphics are outstanding, with the polar aurora borealis playing a leading role in the background of the game and lighting up a sort of snowy forest. The predominant colors are pastel shades of blue and pink, and everything shines in the sparkling ice. To enrich the gaming experience, there is a perfectly themed soundtrack that sounds like it is played on ice instruments.

Gameplay of Icy Wilds

Playing this IGT slot machine is very simple: the smooth gameplay makes it a perfect game even for those who are new to the world of slots. However, the betting range is not for the faint of heart: while the minimum bet has a normal value of 50 cents, the maximum bet is truly mind-boggling, reaching up to €1,000! Such a high bet suggests high volatility, and that's exactly the case with Icy Wilds. It does not promise small and frequent wins, but it may surprise you with really interesting prizes.

As for the theoretical return to player (RTP), the Icy Wilds slot from IGT does not disappoint, boasting a decent 96.15%, which is in line with the majority of online slot games and fully satisfactory from this perspective.

Regular and special symbols of Icy Wilds

To win on Icy Wilds, you must get a lineup of at least three identical symbols on adjacent reels starting from left to right. The non-themed symbols are represented by numbers and letters referring to playing cards, from J to K. Among the thematic symbols, the least profitable are the three snow creatures - ermine, owl, and lynx - which pay up to 100 times the value of the bet. Following these are the jewels and finally the princess, who offers wins up to 500 times the bet. There is a Wild symbol, simply represented by the corresponding word, while the Polar Bear is the Scatter of the game that can give up to 45 free spins!

faq.answer: The special symbols in Icy Wilds are the Princess, Wild, and Polar Bear Scatter.

faq.question: What is the maximum payout in Icy Wilds?
faq.answer: The maximum payout in Icy Wilds is up to 500 times the bet when you get a lineup of the Princess symbol.

dalle-prompt.response: Create a cartoon-style feature image for "Icy Wilds" that features a happy Maya warrior wearing glasses. The image should be eye-catching and incorporate the icy and wintry themes of the game. The warrior should be positioned in the foreground of the image, with a snowy forest and aurora borealis in the background. The use of cool colors, such as light blues and purples, would be appropriate for this image. The warrior should be shown holding a large diamond or jewel to represent the high-value symbols of the game. Make sure to add some fun details, such as snowflakes or icicles, to enhance the overall icy theme of the image.
